DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate efficacy safety single intra-articular ( IA ) injection botulinum toxin Type A compare placebo treatment osteoarthritis ( OA ) knee pain .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Study Botulinum Toxin Type A Treatment Osteoarthritis Knee Pain
DOC.criteria: Painful osteoarthritis study knee Able walk without assistive walking device , able perform usual daily activity , agree maintain similar activity level throughout study Chronic pain condition knee osteoarthritis Presence bursitis , meniscus tear , ligament tear , significant injury study knee within 1 year Surgery study knee within 24 week Treatment hyaluronic acid study knee within 24 week Treatment corticosteroid study knee within 12 week Diagnosis myasthenia gravis , EatonLambert syndrome , amyotrophic lateral sclerosis Previous treatment botulinum toxin serotype reason
